statements: SELECT * FROM email_segmentation;
SELECT email_address, behavior_score FROM email_segmentation ORDER BY behavior_score DESC;
SELECT id, email_address, engagement_level FROM email_segmentation WHERE behavior_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM email_segmentation WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT id, email_address, behavior_score, engagement_level FROM email_segmentation ORDER BY email_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_segmentation WHERE behavior_score > 75 ORDER BY email_address DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT email_address, behavior_score FROM email_segmentation WHERE engagement_level = 'High' ORDER BY behavior_score ASC
SELECT email_address, behavior_score, engagement_level FROM email_segmentation WHERE behavior_score BETWEEN 50 AND 70
SELECT * FROM email_segmentation WHERE behavior_score < 50 AND engagement_level IS NULL
SELECT MAX(behavior_score) AS max_score, MIN(behavior_score) AS min_score FROM email_segmentation
SELECT * FROM email_lists;
SELECT email_address, user_behavior FROM email_lists WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT email_id, email_address FROM email_lists WHERE user_behavior = 'Active' ORDER BY email_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM segment_details WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segment_details WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT email_id, email_address FROM email_lists WHERE user_behavior = 'active';
SELECT * FROM email_lists ORDER BY email_address DESC;
SELECT email_id, user_behavior, engagement_level FROM email_lists WHERE user_behavior = 'inactive' AND engagement_level = 'low';
SELECT * FROM segment_details WHERE segment_name LIKE '%target%';
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, segment_description FROM segment_details ORDER BY segment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior;
SELECT email, user_id, behavior_level FROM user_behavior ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT level_name, description FROM engagement_levels WHERE level_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, segment_name FROM email_lists WHERE level_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, behavior_level FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_level > 3;
SELECT email, user_id FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_level < 2 ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_levels WHERE level_name LIKE '%gold%';
SELECT list_id, segment_name, user_id FROM email_lists WHERE level_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM email_lists WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY list_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmailListSegmentation;
SELECT user_id, email FROM EmailListSegmentation WHERE engagement_level > 5;
SELECT behavior_category, behavior_description FROM UserBehavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT rule_name, condition FROM SegmentationRules WHERE rule_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, member_since FROM SegmentMembers WHERE segment_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, email, engagement_level FROM EmailListSegmentation WHERE engagement_level > 5 ORDER BY email DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, email, engagement_level FROM EmailListSegmentation WHERE engagement_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY engagement_level ASC, email ASC
SELECT user_id, email, engagement_level FROM EmailListSegmentation WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND engagement_level < 5
SELECT user_id, behavior_category, behavior_description FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_category = 'Click' AND TIMESTAMP > '2022-01-01'
SELECT rule_id, rule_name FROM SegmentationRules WHERE condition LIKE '%active%'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email, behavior_type FROM users;
SELECT email, engagement_level FROM users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT list_id, list_name, segment_criteria FROM email_lists ORDER BY list_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE interaction_type = 'click' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email, engagement_level FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, u.email, e.list_name FROM users u JOIN email_subscriptions es ON u.user_id = es.user_id JOIN email_lists e ON es.list_id = e.list_id WHERE e.segment_criteria = 'VIP' ORDER BY u.user_id;

SELECT u.user_id, u.email, COUNT(el.log_id) AS total_emails FROM users u LEFT JOIN email_subscriptions es ON u.user_id = es.user_id LEFT JOIN email_logs el ON es.subscription_id = el.email_id GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING total_emails > 10;
SELECT u.user_id, u.email, es.subscribe_date FROM users u INNER JOIN email_subscriptions es ON u.user_id = es.user_id WHERE es.subscribe_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
